pages.text: $(item)Coffins$(), originally emerging from $(l:bewitchment:creatures/vampire)Vampires$(), have recently found traction especially among night-active witches.$(br)When you sleep in one, you can $(marked)skip the day$().$(br)Coffins, much like $(item)beds$(), can be $(marked)dyed$() if they're white.
Coffins can be made from any type of bed.
